## JsonFile.loadAndValidate() method

Loads a JSON file and validate its schema.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static loadAndValidate(jsonFilename: string, jsonSchema: JsonSchema, options?: IJsonSchemaValidateOptions): JsonObject;
```
